content:
=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: Record IPO boom: Over 700 issues raise  ₹3.8 trillion in two years, young companies lead listings: Report
Source: LiveMint - Markets
Published: 2025-12-28 02:29
Related Stocks: RELIANCE
Categories: markets

Summary:
In 2025, the Indian IPO market thrived with 365 companies raising ₹1.95 trillion, driven by strong investor interest across sectors. Retail and foreign investors contributed significantly, highlighting a trend toward diversification and increased participation from younger firms.

Sentiment: positive
URL: https://www.livemint.com/market/stock-market-news/record-ipo-boom-over-700-issues-raise-rs-3-8-trillion-in-two-years-young-companies-lead-listings-report-11766822302518.html
